languageKey.label: Side guide
Dette undermodul tilbyder en ramme for side guider. Aktuelt tilbydes guider for oprettelse af sider, sortering af sider efter titel etc. Flere guider kan tilf√∏jes.
Page Wizards
This submodule provides a framework where wizards can be added. Available wizards currently include a wizard for creating pages and sorting pages by title etc.
